definition: a grand and imposing entrance (often extended metaphorically)
details:
noun
- a grand and imposing entrance (often extended metaphorically)
= example: a grand and imposing entrance (often extended metaphorically)
- a short vein that carries blood into the liver
= synonyms: portal vein, hepatic portal vein
- a site that the owner positions as an entrance to other sites on the internet
= example: a site that the owner positions as an entrance to other sites on the internet
= synonyms: portal site
